title: 7Park Data Appoints Head of Global Sales
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 1:01 PM Companies mentioned in this article: 7Park Data 
NEW YORK, NY -- (Marketwired) -- 09/10/15 -- 7Park Data , a leading provider of data-driven information products to enterprise decision makers worldwide, today announced the appointment of Gwilym Jones as head of global sales. Jones will lead the company's sales and customer success teams and will be responsible for driving sustainable growth and continued profitability as well as scaling the company's global presence. This appointment follows two recent company announcements: a $3 million Series A round of funding and the availability of Traffic Intelligence , a new product suite that helps businesses understand web and mobile consumer behavior across a range of usage and engagement metrics. 
Jones previously led sales and new business development at GfK Consumer Choices North America and GfK Boutique, a leading market research and data analytics company that serves a global client base including Global 500 corporations and financial institutions. His tenure at GfK resulted in significant global revenue growth year over year. He previously served as vice president of software alliances and vice president of sales at ADP and led sales at First Data's Taxware division (now Sovos Compliance). Jones holds a bachelor's degree from Northeastern University and an MBA from the University of Massachusetts. 
"With a proven track record of success that spans more than twenty years and extensive experience building agile sales teams in high-growth technology and information businesses, Gwil is an outstanding addition to our leadership team," said Alex Nephew, cofounder of 7Park Data. "Gwil's appointment reinforces our commitment to delivering leading-edge intelligence products to new and existing customers around the world. We're thrilled to welcome him aboard." 
About 7Park Data 7Park Data provides data intelligence to businesses around the world, powered by the largest and most accurate portfolio of behavioral data. The company combines anonymous mobile, web and purchasing data -- collected in real-time from millions of users from 75 countries -- with in-house expert analysis to offer businesses unprecedented clarity into marketplace trends, evolving customer preferences, and investment opportunities. 7Park Data's industry-leading data intelligence products -- App Intelligence, Merchant Intelligence, Product Intelligence, Traffic Intelligence and Web Intelligence -- report on vital performance measures with unparalleled granularity and scale, including activity within mobile apps, mobile and desktop web traffic, online and in-store consumer spending, and more. Data-driven businesses depend on 7Park Data intelligence for more accurate benchmarking, forecasting, and strategic decision-making. 7Park Data was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in New York City.
